title: Introducing MulmoCast: A New Era of Presentations

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Hi everyone! Today I’m excited to introduce a brand-new tool designed for a world where humans and AI create together: MulmoCast.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: MulmoCast is a multi-modal presentation tool—reimagined from the ground up for the age of AI. It’s not just for slide decks; it’s built for podcasts, videos, comics, and more.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Traditional tools like PowerPoint and Keynote were built before AI became creative. MulmoCast is different—it’s AI-native, meaning it’s designed with AI as a co-creator.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: At the heart of MulmoCast is something called MulmoScript. Think of it like a screenplay for AI—it tells the AI what to say, show, and animate, across formats.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Here’s the cool part: AI can automatically generate MulmoScript from your notes, documents, or even a conversation. Then it turns that into a podcast, a comic, a narrated video—you name it!

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Why does this matter? Because the way we consume information is changing. People don’t just sit through slides—they watch, listen, scroll, and interact.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: With MulmoCast, your content meets people where they are—on the train via podcast, in class via slides, or online via video and comics.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: It’s a toolkit for the future of storytelling, where human creativity and AI intelligence combine across every medium.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Whether you're an educator, a marketer, or a curious creator—MulmoCast helps you tell your story in every format, powered by AI.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: MulmoCast isn't just a presentation tool. It's a platform for multi-modal expression in an AI-native world.
